property.name: Initial CIE 1931 Chromaticity Coordinates
property.description: This property represents the initial chromaticity coordinates x and y of a device using CIE 1931 \RefRef{cie1931} Cx and Cy chromaticity coordinates at first use of the device. The value typically is measured by a spectrometer or a chroma meter, but can also be reported by a device that is aware of its chromaticity values, either by measurement or as a result of an association of its operating parameters with a color model. The property value typically is configured by the manufacturer of the device.
